SELECT c.*,u.name AS user_name,u.level_id AS user_level_id,u.photo AS user_photo,u.sex AS sex,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comment_love cl WHERE cl.comment_id = c.id) AS love_count,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `comment` cc WHERE cc.parent_id = c.id) AS comment_count,cl2.id AS my_love_id FROM `comment` c JOIN `user` u ON c.`user_id` = u.`id` LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM comment_love cl WHERE cl.`user_id` = #{userId}) cl2 ON c.`id` = cl2.comment_id WHERE c.id IN #{ids}
ORDER BY c.id DESC
SELECT ci.img_path FROM comment_image ci WHERE ci.comment_id = #{commentId}

SELECT c.id AS id,u.id AS send_user_id,u.name AS sender_name,(SELECT ui.name FROM `comment` ci JOIN `user` ui ON ci.user_id = ui.id WHERE ci.id = #{commentId}) AS receive_name,c.context AS context,c.create_time AS create_time FROM `comment` c JOIN `user` u ON c.user_id = u.id WHERE c.parent_id = #{commentId} UNION SELECT c.id AS id,u.id AS send_user_id,u.name AS sender_name,(SELECT ui.name FROM `comment` ci JOIN `user` ui ON ci.user_id = ui.id WHERE ci.id = c.parent_id) AS receive_name,c.context AS context,c.create_time AS create_time FROM `comment` c JOIN `user` u ON c.user_id = u.id WHERE c.parent_id IN (SELECT c2.id FROM `comment` c2 WHERE c2.parent_id = #{commentId}) ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 20

SELECT c.id AS id,u.id AS send_user_id,u.name AS sender_name,(SELECT ui.name FROM `comment` ci JOIN `user` ui ON ci.user_id = ui.id WHERE ci.id = #{commentId}) AS receive_name,c.context AS context,c.create_time AS create_time FROM `comment` c JOIN `user` u ON c.user_id = u.id WHERE c.parent_id = #{commentId} UNION SELECT c.id AS id,u.id AS send_user_id,u.name AS sender_name,(SELECT ui.name FROM `comment` ci JOIN `user` ui ON ci.user_id = ui.id WHERE ci.id = c.parent_id) AS receive_name,c.context AS context,c.create_time AS create_time FROM `comment` c JOIN `user` u ON c.user_id = u.id WHERE c.parent_id IN (SELECT c2.id FROM `comment` c2 WHERE c2.parent_id = #{commentId}) ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT #{page.pageNo},#{pageSize}
SELECT * FROM comment c WHERE c.id = #{0}

SELECT c.*,cr2.id AS read_id,u.name AS user_name,u.level_id AS user_level_id,u.photo AS user_photo,u.sex AS sex,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comment_love cl WHERE cl.comment_id = c.id) AS love_count,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `comment` cc WHERE cc.parent_id = c.id) AS comment_count,cl2.id AS my_love_id FROM `comment` c JOIN `user` u ON c.`user_id` = u.`id` LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM comment_love cl WHERE cl.`user_id` = #{userId}) cl2 ON c.`id` = cl2.comment_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT cr.id AS id,cr.comment_id AS comment_id FROM comment_read cr WHERE cr.user_id = #{userId}) cr2 ON c.id = cr2.comment_id WHERE c.id IN #{id}

SELECT uni_table.id FROM ( (SELECT c.`id` AS id,cpc.create_time AS create_time FROM community_post cp JOIN community_post_comment cpc ON cp.`id` = cpc.`post_id` JOIN `comment` c ON cpc.`comment_id` = c.`id` WHERE cp.`user_id` = #{userId} UNION SELECT c.`id` AS id,c.create_time AS create_time FROM `comment` c WHERE c.`parent_id` IN (SELECT c.id FROM `comment` c WHERE c.`user_id` = #{userId}) )ORDER BY create_time DESC ) uni_table LIMIT #{page.pageNo},#{page.pageSize}
